id,

mapper.update:
update t_mov
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mov_url = #{movUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
res_url = #{resUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_mov set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mov_url = #{movUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, res_url = #{resUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_mov where name like CONCAT('%',#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
